short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows full date/time in groups listing and detail headers. Added support for custom date/time format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Groups displays time and or date in a specific format based on how old a message is.
This extension always shows full date and time no matter how old the message.
